translation.de: Also: "Willst du Hummus mit mir aufwischen?"

translation.en: -So that's it. You're a pro. -Yes!
So you wipe the hummus.
We've got twice-cooked eggplant that Nok's got.
We've got beets with tahina and then our hummus tahina.
translation.de: Wir haben Rind mit Tahina und unseren Hummus mit Tahina.

translation.en: All right, so enjoy.
When I opened the restaurant, the support that I had from the community,
translation.de: Bei der Restauranteröffnung war die Unterstützung durch die Gemeinschaft,

translation.en: Mike, from everybody, is just amazing.
translation.de: durch Mike, durch alle einfach unglaublich.

translation.en: -Yeah, we're like… right-- -Neighbors. [chuckles]
She'll come over at seven o'clock at night and she'll be like, "Chef!"
translation.de: Sie kommt um 7 Uhr und ruft: "Chef!"

translation.en: -[Nok chuckles] -Is that right? -"I have some food for you." -What?
She'll bring us 18 things. I'm like, "Oh my God."
translation.de: Und bringt 18 Dinge. Und ich: "Oh Mann."

translation.en: -Oh my God. See, that's community. -Yeah.
This is a community, yeah.
So, we got eggplant barbecued with zhug, which is a Yemenite chili paste.
translation.de: Wir haben Auberginen-Barbecue mit Zhug, einer jemenitischen Chilipaste.

translation.en: -[Michael] And on top-- -Oh! What, are you ironing it?
-Yeah. And we're gonna sort of-- -[chuckles]
[Nok] Where do you get this tiny thing?
translation.de: Woher hast du das winzige Ding?

translation.en: You know what? I take care of laundry for everybody.
translation.de: Ich kümmere mich um die Wäsche für alle.

translation.en: And what we're doing is burning a little bit of the garlic
and the ginger and the cardamom in there as well.
You're a showman, Michael. You're a showman.
Guys, leave your pants here. I'll take care of it. Yeah, I might have to.
translation.de: -Lasst eure Hosen hier. Ich kümmere mich. -Vielleicht muss ich das.

translation.en: [Michael] You know, Phil, I actually need your help for this last course, all right?
translation.de: Phil, ich brauche deine Hilfe für den letzten Gang.

translation.en: Yes, he was afraid things were going too well. -[Michael laughs] -So he needs me to help.
translation.de: Ja, er hat Angst, dass es zu gut läuft, also braucht er meine Hilfe.

translation.en: [Monica] Oh, Philip.
-[Michael] You got it? -Yeah.
[Michael] Okay, here we go.
[Phil] Ladies and gentlemen, may I present one of my favorite dishes in the world.
translation.de: Meine Damen und Herren, ich präsentiere eines meiner Lieblingsgerichte.

translation.en: This is his lamb shoulder…
-[Nok] And you cooked this? -…with molasses…
-[Monica] Bravo. -…and pomegranate.
-Oh my goodness. -[Jeff] Wow.
[Phil] This is when I fell in love with Michael.
translation.de: -Wow. -So habe ich mich in Michael verliebt.

translation.en: -And I approve. -[Marc] Wow.
Oh, and this is… You do this. You do this.
[Marc] I'm going in.
[Monica] This is good.
-[Nok chuckles] Are you dancing? -This is so good.
-[Phil] Monica. Come on. -[Jeff] Wow.
[Phil] Community really is the name of the game in Philadelphia.
To me, that's always meant family.
And, with friends old and new here,
what are friends but the family you choose?
translation.de: sind die Familie, die du dir wählst.

translation.en: And sometimes ride.
So, Mr. WC Fields, save your tombstone,
translation.de: Also, Mr. W. C. Fields, vergessen Sie Ihren Grabstein,

translation.en: because I'd rather be in Philly than a lot of other places.
translation.de: denn ich bin lieber in Philly als an vielen anderen Orten.

translation.en: One thing's for sure, I know I'll eat well.
translation.de: Eines ist sicher. Ich werde gut essen.

translation.en: In all the shows we've done,
I think I've eaten more this week in Philadelphia
translation.de: Ich glaube, ich habe diese Woche in Philadelphia mehr gegessen

translation.en: than in any other city in the world.
translation.de: als in jeder anderen Stadt der Welt.

translation.en: -[Phil] Michael! -[group cheers]
[Michael] Thank you, guys, so much.
This means everything to me.
I love you guys. I love this city.
translation.de: Ich liebe euch und diese Stadt.

translation.en: -[Phil] Yes. -I love this city.
-I f****** love this city so much. -Don't curse!
-Sorry. -[group laughs]
It's Philly. We're trying to keep it real.
♪ Somebody feed him now ♪
